title: Ebro In The Morning - Kanye's Newest Meltdown + Biden's Presidential Address
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning - this episode aired on 9/2/2022.

Ebro, Rosenberg, Laura Stylez and the crew are in the studio talking about Kanye's recent rant about his children and schooling, Kendrick's short film, Joe Biden's recent presidential address, and much more!

All that and more on Ebro In The Morning! 

Subscribe to "Summer Jam: Through The Years" - hosted by Laura Stylez!

iTunes: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/summer-jam-through-the-years/id1627066431 

Amazon: https://music.amazon.com/podcasts/6dfef9f3-4ff5-4d05-a857-6689c99aa999/summer-jam-through-the-years

Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/7MP62llakMJSXkJzwFclgq

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
